clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indicated for the treatment of allergic conditions symptomatic relief of hypersensitivity reaction and treatment of pruritic skin disorders

contraindications.disease: The signs and symptoms that are produced after the acute overdosage of Mepyramine include Convulsions Coma Ataxia Hyperpyrexia Tremor Extrapyramidal effects Excitement
